pages.title: How to complete this form

components.name: qkedOh
components.content:
Eligibility

Only complete this form to notify us if you're making 20 or more people redundant in an establishment on one form.

You do not need to notify us if you're making less than 20 people redundant.

An establishment is the site where an employee is assigned to work.

If you operate from more than one site, each site is treated separately for notification and consultation purposes.

If your division or team has employees in various locations, the division or team is considered as an establishment so only give one address.

What you need to know before starting

This form has 8 parts and takes on average 40 minutes.

The form will not save your information until you submit it at the end. If you close or leave the page for longer than 90 mins, you'll need to start again.

Before submitting, make sure you save/print the final summary page. We only send an email confirming receipt of your form (not a copy of the answers provided).

You'll need the following information to hand:

  • company number - find company information (opens in new tab)
  • nature of the business - find (SIC code) (opens in new tab)
  • timing and location of redundancies
  • expected number of redundancies
  • reasons for redundancies
  • trade union and/or employee representative(s) details
